channel.title: This Is A Tut How To Add New Rs Whip, D Long/D Scimmy, Dh Axe In Your Server
channel.description:
Before You Remove This I Want To Just say People Want To See This Topic And Also This Is Only Place I Can Post Please Put Into Right Section And Pm Me. Becuase I Really Dont No Were to Post This. So Heres My Tutorial That Alot Of People Want.
Firstly Go Here And Download These Models Here http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ozxoommnjzt
Copy And Paste Them Files Into The Model Folder Found In Your Client.
Then Go To Your Client And Find The File [code]applet_sub1.java[/code] Then Once You Have Opened It Press Ctrl+f And Search [code] Class75_Sub1.aClass98_3294.method1568(class19, 106, (long) i_3_);[/code] Then Just Copy And Paste This Straight Underneath it [code]case 4151: class19.anInt390 = 5409;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves class19.anInt387 = 5409;//female model id class19.anInt330 = 5412;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 900;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 280;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -2;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2 break; case 1305: class19.anInt390 = 564;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves class19.anInt387 = 564;//female model id class19.anInt330 = 565;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 1580;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 550;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 380;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -2;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2 break; }
if(i_3_ == 4587)// { class19.anInt390 = 6031;//Male model id class19.anInt330 = 6033;//inventory/drop model } if(i_3_ == 4718)// { class19.anInt390 = 6702;//Male model id }[/code]
Credits 99% Me 1% Mediafire.com Letting Me Upload Secondly If You Ass This To Your Server Please Give Me Credits As It's My First Release Thank You Have Fun If You Use This In V2.5 Look Forwarding To See It If You Release :D
Also Please Dont Remove As It Will Stop People Asking, Also Dont Lock If Its In Wrong Section Please Just Move Thank You!

item.title: This Is A Tut How To Add New Rs Whip, D Long/D Scimmy, Dh Axe In Your Server
item.dc:creator: @tokkulscap508 tokkulscap508
item.description:
@tokkulscap508 wrote:

Before You Remove This I Want To Just say People Want To See This Topic And Also This Is Only Place I Can Post Please Put Into Right Section And Pm Me. Becuase I Really Dont No Were to Post This. So Heres My Tutorial That Alot Of People Want.

Firstly Go Here And Download These Models Here http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ozxoommnjzt

Copy And Paste Them Files Into The Model Folder Found In Your Client.

Then Go To Your Client And Find The File applet_sub1.java Then Once You Have Opened It Press Ctrl+f And Search Class75_Sub1.aClass98_3294.method1568(class19, 106, (long) i_3_); Then Just Copy And Paste This Straight Underneath it [code]case 4151:
class19.anInt390 = 5409;//Male model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves
class19.anInt387 = 5409;//female model id
class19.anInt330 = 5412;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 900;//model zoom
class19.anInt389 = 280;//modelRotation1
class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = -2;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2
break;
case 1305:
class19.anInt390 = 564;//Male model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves
class19.anInt387 = 564;//female model id
class19.anInt330 = 565;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 1580;//model zoom
class19.anInt389 = 550;//modelRotation1
class19.anInt395 = 380;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = -2;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2
break;
}

if(i_3_ == 4587)//
{
class19.anInt390 = 6031;//Male model id
class19.anInt330 = 6033;//inventory/drop model
}
if(i_3_ == 4718)//
{
class19.anInt390 = 6702;//Male model id
}[/code]

Credits 99% Me 1% Mediafire.com Letting Me Upload Secondly If You Ass This To Your Server Please Give Me Credits As Itâ€™s My First Release Thank You Have Fun If You Use This In V2.5 Look Forwarding To See It If You Release

Also Please Dont Remove As It Will Stop People Asking, Also Dont Lock If Its In Wrong Section Please Just Move Thank You!

Read full topic
item.source: This Is A Tut How To Add New Rs Whip, D Long/D Scimmy, Dh Axe In Your Server
